article: the revelations that the terrorists who struck the world trade center and the pentagon received training at flight schools in the united states and that at least one of them was in the country on a student visa have reignited a long-simmering debate over unrestricted access by foreign students to sensitive courses at american universities .
abstract: access to u.s. courses is under scrutiny in aftermath of attacks
